kids adult adult large r10 & r16 chain 2 counts as 1st double_crochet throughout work 1 double_crochet in each of the notes next 4 sts do not work in the same st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts * 1 double_crochet in each of the next 5 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts repeat from * to end join to the top of the beg chain 2 60 r11 & r17 chain 2 work 1 double_crochet in each of the next 4 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet * 1 double_crochet in each of the next 5 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet repeat from * to end join to top of beg chain 2 60 r12 & r18 accent row chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in same st & in each st to end join to 1st single_crochet 60 r13 & r19 chain 1 work * 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 sts do not work in same st on 1st repeat 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in each of the next 5 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts repeat from * to end join to 1st single_crochet 60 r14 chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in same st 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of the next 5 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet * 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of the next 5 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet repeat from * to end join to 1st single_crochet 60 r15 accent row chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in same st & in each st to end join to 1st
